name: Deliv' 51
description:
Story

You’re a delivery guy in a distopic future with a brain implant which explode if you don’t do your delivers fast enough. Bad luck for you, there’s an alien invasion and the president wants you to also kills the aliens. What will you do!?

Controls:

Drive

  • Up arrow: accelerate
  • Down arrow: Brake
  • Left and Right arrows: Turn
Team:
  • Antoine SEMBLAT: Game & level design
  • Aurélien MONTERO: Sound & music
  • Gautier DI FUSCO: Art
  • Nicolas LAURENT: Programing
  • Nico NOWAK: Art & animation
